nodes.text: Ferfer was a male Ryn who was a part of the Ryn Network, as gatherer One-Six-Four out of Balmorra, during the Yuuzhan Vong War. He was a member of Team Meloque, who infiltrated Yuuzhan Vong-occupied Caluula in order to destroy that world's yammosk in the last year of the war. He was killed when he was split open by an amphistaff wielded by a Slayer.
